organic.title: HOPE Animal-Assisted Crisis Response – Comfort in Times of Crisis
organic.snippet: HOPE AACR gives Comfort in Times of Crisis by bringing emotional support with our specially-trained canine and handler teams.

organic.title: Contact - HOPE Animal-Assisted Crisis Response
organic.snippet: To request HOPE Crisis Response teams, call toll free: 877-HOPE-K9s (877-467-3597). HOPE AACR teams respond without charge.

organic.title: Hope Animal-Assisted Crisis Response - Facebook
organic.snippet: Providing comfort through animal-assisted support to individuals affected by crises and disasters.
